Package: prioritizr

Decision class

Decision class

This class is used to represent the type of decision that is made when prioritizing planning units. This class represents a recipe to make a decision, to actually specify the type of decision in a planning problem, see the help page on decisions. Only experts should use this class directly.

Fields

  • $namecharacter name of decision.
  • $vtypecharacter specifying the variable type for planning units. The available types are binary ('B') or semi-continuous ('S').
  • $parameters\ link{Parameters} object used to customize the decision.
  • $datalist object with data.
  • $validatefunction used to validate that the decision type is compatible with a given ConservationProblem object.
  • $applyfunction used to apply the decision type to a OptimizationProblem object.

Usage

x <- Objective$new(name, vtype, parameters, data,
                                 validate, apply)
x$print() x$show() x$repr()

x$validate(cp) x$apply(op)

x$get_parameter(id) x$get_all_parameters() x$set_parameter(id, value) x$render_parameter(id) x$render_all_parameter()

Arguments

id
id object.
value
any object.
cp
ConservationProblem object.
op
OptimizationProblem object.

Details

print
print the object
show
show the object
validate
validate that data used to formulate the decisions are compatible with data in a ConservationProblem object.
apply
add decision types to an OptimizationProblem object.
get_parameter
retrieve the value of a parameter.
get_all_parameters
generate list containing all the parameters.
set_parameter
change the value of a parameter to new value.
render_parameter
generate a shiny widget to modify the the value of a parameter (specified by argument id).
render_all_parameters
generate a shiny div containing all the parameters' widgets.
